overview: A top US Air Force fighter pilot decides that his call sign of Black Angel means that he's a messenger of God. Freely committing murders as he goes, he steals a nuclear weapon and his plane. Taking a family hostage to help him, he works on bypassing the bomb's security lockouts so he can use it on the most sinful of American cities.
tagline: A renegade pilot armed with a nuclear missile... only one man can stop this angel of death.
title: Flight of Black Angel
